ing: 2 fluid ounces Irish cream liqueur (such as BaileysÂ®)
1/2 cup crushed ice, or as needed
des: "A holiday favorite that is requested time and time again. Festive and delicious, and so easy to make. Enjoy!"
ins: Pour Irish cream liqueur, vanilla-flavored vodka, cinnamon schnapps, and butterscotch schnapps into a cocktail shaker; add ice. Cover shaker, shake, and strain drink into a martini glass.
